game.name: KUUKIYOMI: Consider It World - Thailand Ver.
game.categories: Single-player, Keyboard Only Option, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Introducing the New Title: “KUUKIYOMI: Consider It World”! This time, the stage is Thailand! Test your ability to read the room in familiar, everyday Thai scenarios, packed with cultural quirks and “That’s so true!” moments.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Introducing the New Title: “KUUKIYOMI: Consider It World”! This time, the stage is Thailand! Test your ability to read the room in familiar, everyday Thai scenarios, packed with cultural quirks and “That’s so true!” moments.
